title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API for chat, generate, embed, and pull operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers to interact with a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, and chat models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, managing models, RAG, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library providing typed wrappers for chat, generate, pull, and embedding APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem exposing chat, generate, embed, and model control endpoints with native streaming.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama.cpp wrapper)
summary: Lightning-fast CLI that bundles optimized llama.cpp backends for Apple Silicon, Linux, and Windows GPUs.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model for offline completions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration supplying OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK and CLI for chat, generate, and embeddings with System.Text.Json streaming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rag-stack
summary: Starter template combining Ollama, FastAPI, ChromaDB, and Streamlit for private RAG deployments.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server using slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with RxJS streaming for chat and generate endpoints.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate exposing async/await wrappers over the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library with GenServer behaviour for streaming chat completions and managing local models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a “Ask Ollama” command to summarize notes or brainstorm inside your vault.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models via mentions or app-home tabs.
